summary: PepeCoin - PepeCoin is a cryptocurrency that was created in 2016. It has a team of 8+ members with combined experience in tech and cryptocurrencies. The core team includes Pr0m3theus, damoos3, Big Brain Pepe, and Smille_=). PepeCoin aims to merge culture with technology and has developed various products such as Kekdaq, PEPEAI, and MemeJourney. They also have plans to launch a social media site named Pepe.dj and a NFT marketplace called Kekdaq. PepeCoin is an ERC-20 token and is associated with the name Memetic.
